Rules

  • No Flaming

    • Flaming is the posting of hostile or insulting messages to an individual or group. You may not harass or demean anyone based on appearance, race, gender, age, etc.

  • No Bias

    • We do not allow any bias towards or against any group or individual

  • Links

    • We allow linking to sites with appropriate content. Do not link to sites that include anything that isn't family friendly. Additionally, we will censor any competitive site that is not affiliated directly with Disney.

  • Small Signatures

    • Signatures should not be abused. Please keep them free of videos and large images, or a large amount of text. They should not distract from or be bigger than the average post.

  • Abuse of Site Systems

    • You may not maliciously add, modify, or remove content posted by yourself or others. If you are found, at our discretion, to be editing posts with arbitrary intentions, removing posts to disrupt this site, posting spam content to the site, or otherwise causing problems, it could result in removal of site privileges and/or a temporary or permanent ban. This includes working around the censors we have setup.

    Abuse of the like system is not allowed. Persons found, at our discretion, to be soliciting or exchanging likes could receive a temporary or permanent ban.

    Additionally, content posted that disrupts the community, such at those promoting other sites or games, will be removed at our discretion.

  • No Drama

    • We do not allow drama here. Please conduct yourself respectfully and don't cause trouble between any group or individual.

    We define drama as: controversial topics or behavior, or discussion, that could be based on inflammatory or untrue information, or that are drastically emotional or highly emotional driven, seeking reaction from the rest.

    Persons responsible for drama could face a temporary or permanent ban.

  • Language

    • We do not allow language that is obscene, bigoted, sexually explicit, or suggestive in nature. Additionally, you may not post harassing messages. Persons found posting such content could face a temporary or permanent ban.

  • Discussion Topics

    • You may not suggest, encourage, boast about, or discuss your participation in, any illegal activity. Persons found dicussing such activities could face a temporary or permanent ban.

Terms

You agree to not use this service to post any material which is defamatory, abusive, hateful, threatening, or otherwise violates any laws.

We reserve the rights to remove or modify any messages posted for any reason.

You retain copyright and any other rights you already hold in Content which you submit, post or display on or through this site. You understand and agree that if you use this site after the date on which the Terms and Rules have changed, we will treat your use as acceptance of the updated Terms and Rules.

Privacy Policy

We recognize that privacy is an important concern of our members. This privacy policy applies to all personal information submitted by you to this site.

When signing up on our site, we require you submit a name, birthdate, and email address. No extremely personal information is stored by us.

We will not sell, transmit, or distribute, any data held without your prior permission or consent, unless required to do so under relevant United States legislation.

All other information provided by you may appear on your profile, and is entirely optional, and all of that information is held there at your own risk. This information is editable in the settings for your account. If you have any issues, please contact us for help.

We will make all reasonable effort to ensure that all personal information about you is submitted and maintained securely on our servers. However, we make no guarantee of this.

This site is intended for individuals over the age of 13. Any information collected is intended to be of individuals over the age of 13.

You as a user, are given the ability to opt-out of any email messages sent from us. If you are receiving unwanted email messages that appear to be coming from us, please forward the message or send a complaint to abuse[at]piratesforums[dot]com.
